amendment.description: Page 22, line 5, strike "Public disclosure" and insert "Disclosure". Page 22, after line 24, insert the following new subsection: ***.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Chaffetz.
